```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)  #importing, tidying, plotting data
library(knitr)      #making tables
library(readxl)     #reading in .xlsx files


#disables all messages and warnings in final knit
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE) 
```

```{r stats data preparation, include=FALSE, warnings=FALSE}
#bring in model selection data
model_select <- read_excel("data/model_selection.xlsx")
```

```{r tables, echo=FALSE, warnings=FALSE}
kable(model_select[1:5, ], caption = 'Table 1. Model outputs from generalized linear models with model structure, df (degrees of freedom), AIC (Akaike’s information criterion), and ΔAIC (difference in AIC score relative to lowest AIC score).')
